overview: Abhilash Kumar has a Masters degree in Computer Science, and a certification from Microsoft as Microsoft Certified Solution Developer (MCSD). He has worked with some of the best in the industry in developing R&D solutions, including Microsoft, DocuSign, Omnicell Healthcare, AT&T, and Verizon, for the past 9 years. This solution architect is an expert in developing high-end enterprise solutions. Keeping up with his interest in the latest technology, Abhilash is now active in researching on Web/mobile SaaS applications. He has exceptional abilities in project design and management with organizational & supervisory skills.
